level.text: License fees for Child Development Facilities shall vary in accordance with the Facility’s license capacity.
Each applicant for a license to operate a Child Development Center shall pay an initial application/pre-licensure inspection fee, in the amount of $75.00.
The initial license fee, annual renewal license fee, and license replacement fee for each Child Development Facility shall be as follows:
Facilities operated by the District of Columbia Government shall not be required to pay a fee.
The Director may make reasonable adjustment to license fees, as appropriate; a new fee schedule shall be published by the Director at least thirty (30) days before any new fee is implemented.
A fee shall be paid whenever there is a required amendment to a license, including a change of ownership or a change of address.
A fee payment submitted with an application shall not be transferred to any other application.

A late fee, in the amount of $25.00 for Child Development Homes and $50.00 for Child Development Centers, shall be imposed if a license renewal application is not timely filed as specified in subsection 308.1 of this Chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Regulation No. 74-34 published at 21 DCR 1333 (December 27, 1974); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 3793 (April 27, 2007).
